About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

A Mini-Biography

I'm David Salazar, a husband, business owner, Front-End Web Developer, and aspiring Full-Stack. Born in McAllen, TX and was raised a tennis player. Lived in Nashville, New York, United Kingdom, and St. Louis. But these days I live in Austin, TX.

Army West Point

Assistant Men's Tennis Coach

2014 - 2015

Conducted and organized tennis practices while complying with NCAA rules and regulations. Went undefeated in the Patriot League Conference.

Edward Jones

Financial Advisor

2016 - Feb 2018

Built financial plans for individuals and businesses to reach their financial goals

Armis Financial LLC

Founder/Owner

Feb 2018 - Present

I registered my own Independent Financial Advisory Firm to help Friends and Family plan out their own financial futures at half the cost of the status quo.

Lipscomb University, Nashville

B.A. Accounting

2010-2014

Accomplished 150hrs which is enough to sit for the CPA Exam. I was a Division 1 student athlete that balanced rigorous academic studies with games and practices to earn Dean’s List 2011-2012 academic years. Served as team captain 13-14, rallying the team member morale and helping guide young players.

Durham University, UK

Master's in Finance

2015 - 2016

Durham was ranked #61 University in QS World Rankings in 15/16. My research dissertation was on “The Aftermarket Performance of Initial Public Offerings in Taiwan: Before and After 2008 Global Financial Crisis”. On team with athletic scholarship and balanced practices and postgraduate duties. Led by example to earn the respect of my teammates.

Self-Taught Web-Developer

Life-Long Student

2016 - Present

Fell in love with web-development and programming in 2016 when my friend was obtaining his CS Master’s Degree in the UK. Followed syllabuses from the most prominent bootcamps (Hack Reactor, Galvanize, and Thinkful). Always learning and keeping up to date with new technologies. Used a variety of resources help with my learning experiences.
